caption.center: Steve FICKLIN, Appellant v. ARGENTA COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION

opinion.posture: Appeal from Pulaski Circuit, Twelfth Division.
opinion.opinion_text: Joint motion to dismiss appeal and cross-appeal is granted. Motion to unseal record is remanded to the trial court.Page 4
